# File.IsUrl method

Gets a value indicating whether the specified *path* is a web address.

```csharp
public static bool IsUrl(string path)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| path | Path to check. |

## Return Value

Returns true if is a web address; otherwise false.
